mapper.insert: insert into board(bno, writer, title, content, write_date, read_cnt, like_cnt) values(board_sequence.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{readCnt}, #{likeCnt})
mapper.select: select bno, writer, title, content, write_date writeDate, read_cnt readCnt, like_cnt likeCnt from board where bno=#{bno} and rownum=1
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno=#{bno}
mapper.select: select bno, writer, title, content, write_date writeDate, read_cnt readCnt, like_cnt likeCnt from board
